segments.source_content:
---
slug: /123
title: "This Week In React #123: TanStack Router, Gatsby, Remix, Next.js, React-Three-Fiber, Astro, Expo, Open Native, Rome..."
authors: [slorber]
date: 11-08-2022
---
Hi everyone!
It was [Jamstack Conf](https://jamstack.org/conf/) this week, and we had some nice announcements for the occasion, like Tanstack Router, Gatsby 5 or the results of their annual survey.

translations.zh-hant: 本週舉辦了[Jamstack Conf](https://jamstack.org/conf/)，期間有許多精彩發布，包括Tanstack Router、Gatsby 5以及他們的年度調查結果。

segments.source_content: Expo released its superb SDK 47. The 1st release-candidate React-Native 0.71 leads to some Android build issues 😅.

translations.zh-hant: Expo發布了出色的SDK 47。首個候選版本React-Native 0.71導致了一些Android建置問題😅。

segments.source_content: Next.js and React-Native now both use TypeScript by default on new apps.

translations.zh-hant: Next.js和React-Native現在都在新應用中預設使用TypeScript。

segments.source_content: Last chance to buy the [Three.js Journey](https://threejs-journey.com/) course with the promo code [TWIR](https://threejs-journey.com/join/TWIR) (-30%, expires tomorrow). It has just been [upgraded](https://twitter.com/bruno_simon/status/1585222892769497089) with 24 hours of React-Three-Fiber modules. I take this opportunity to highlight [Maxime Heckel's blog](https://blog.maximeheckel.com/) who took the course last year and is now able to do some pretty cool 3D! He has just published an impressive [article on particles](https://blog.maximeheckel.com/posts/the-magical-world-of-particles-with-react-three-fiber-and-shaders/).

zh-hant.translation: 把握最後機會以優惠碼[TWIR](https://threejs-journey.com/join/TWIR)購買[Three.js Journey](https://threejs-journey.com/)課程（-30%，明日到期）。該課程剛[升級](https://twitter.com/bruno_simon/status/1585222892769497089)新增24小時的React-Three-Fiber模組。藉此機會推薦[Maxime Heckel的部落格](https://blog.maximeheckel.com/)，他去年參加此課程後已能製作出相當出色的3D作品！他最近發表了一篇關於粒子的[精彩文章](https://blog.maximeheckel.com/posts/the-magical-world-of-particles-with-react-three-fiber-and-shaders/)。
zh-hant.reason: URL for a 'link' was changed from 'https://threejs-journey.com/' to 'https://threejs-journey.com/join/TWIR'.

segments.source_content: <!-- truncate -->
**💡 [Check this newsletter on Twitter](https://slo.im/thread) - visual format 🎨**

translations.zh-hant: **💡 [在Twitter查看本電子報](https://slo.im/thread) - 視覺化格式🎨**

segments.source_content: import Support from "@site/newsletter/_support.mdx";
<Support />
## 💸 Sponsor {#sponsor1}
[![Sizzy - the browser for developers](/emails/issues/220/sizzy.jpg)](https://sizzy.co/?utm_campaign=newsletter&utm_source=thisweekinreact)
How come professionals in every other industry have specialized tools, but web developers are still stuck using the browser that their grandma is using for shopping on Amazon?

translations.zh-hant: 為什麼各行各業的專業人士都有專用工具，而網頁開發者卻還在使用祖母在Amazon購物的瀏覽器？

segments.source_content: If you're opening localhost:3000 in any other browser except Sizzy, you're wasting hours of your precious time.

translations.zh-hant: 如果你在Sizzy之外的瀏覽器打開localhost:3000，就是在浪費寶貴時間。

segments.source_content: **Before Sizzy:** web development is stressing you out, responsive design is hard, you have an overwhelming amount of opened tabs and apps.

translations.zh-hant: **使用Sizzy前：** 網頁開發令人壓力山大，響應式設計困難重重，開啟過多分頁和應用程式。

segments.source_content: **After Sizzy:** all the tools you need are in one place, responsive design is a breeze, no more context switching.

translations.zh-hant: **使用Sizzy後：** 所有工具整合一處，響應式設計輕鬆搞定，無需切換上下文。

segments.source_content: You can [download it here](https://sizzy.co/?utm_campaign=newsletter&utm_source=thisweekinreact) and try it for free for 14 days!
## ⚛️ React {#react}
[![TanStack Router](/emails/issues/123/tanstack-router.png)](https://tanstack.com/router/v1)
**[TanStack Router](https://tanstack.com/router/v1)**
Tanner unveils his new project: a 100% typesafe, framework-agnostic router. An impressive list of features, including:

translations.zh-hant: Tanner揭曉新專案：100%類型安全、框架無關的路由器。具備令人印象深刻的功能，包括：

segments.source_content:
- URL State Management
- Built-in Caching
- Search Param Schema/Validation
- Auto Prefetching
- Loaders/Actions
- Async Elements + Code-Splitting

translations.zh-hant:
- URL狀態管理
- 內建快取
- 搜尋參數結構/驗證
- 自動預取
- 載入器/動作
- 非同步元件+代碼分割

segments.source_content: At first glance, it looks like there is some inspiration from Remix or React-Router, but the API is quite different and not based on JSX, which probably help to make the solution agnostic and typesafe. For now there is only the React adapter, and the doc is incomplete, but it looks quite promising!

translations.zh-hant: 初步看來，靈感部分源自Remix或React-Router，但API設計差異顯著且不基於JSX，這可能有助實現框架無關與類型安全。目前僅有React適配器，文檔尚不完整，但前景相當看好！

segments.source_content: 🔗 **Useful links**:

- 🐦 [Tanner Linsley](https://twitter.com/tannerlinsley/status/1590101866385489929) launches his project on Twitter with a great trailer!
- 🐦 [Ryan Florence](https://twitter.com/ryanflorence/status/1590194770936463362) could use some inspiration from his work to improve Remix type-safety.

translations.zh-hant:
- 🐦 [Tanner Linsley](https://twitter.com/tannerlinsley/status/1590101866385489929)在Twitter發布專案並附精彩宣傳片！
- 🐦 [Ryan Florence](https://twitter.com/ryanflorence/status/1590194770936463362)可參考其工作成果來提升Remix類型安全性。

segments.source_content: [![Gatsby 5: The Fastest Gatsby Yet](/emails/issues/123/gatsby5.png)](https://www.gatsbyjs.com/blog/gatsby-5/)
**[Gatsby 5: The Fastest Gatsby Yet](https://www.gatsbyjs.com/blog/gatsby-5/)**

Gatsby 5.0 has just been officially released. It includes the Gatsby Slice API which allows to improve the build time when modifying a layout element (header, footer...), and the support in beta of the Server Components which allow partial hydration. There are also new Head/Script components, GraphiQL v2, and more.

translations.zh-hant: Gatsby 5.0 已正式發佈。它包含 Gatsby Slice API，可在修改佈局元素（如頁首、頁尾等）時提升建置速度；同時支援測試版的 Server Components，可實現部分水合作用（partial hydration）。此外還新增了 Head/Script 元件、GraphiQL v2 等功能。

segments.source_content: Gatsby also presented [Valhalla](https://www.gatsbyjs.com/products/valhalla-content-hub/), a new service on their cloud that proposes to use Gatsby source plugins to create a content hub and a unified GraphQL API decoupled, from Gatsby. It is [possible to use Valhalla with Next.js](<https://github.com/gatsby-inc/valhalla-examples/blob/main/frameworks/nextjs/app/(pets)/page.tsx>).

translations.zh-hant: Gatsby 還推出了 [Valhalla](https://www.gatsbyjs.com/products/valhalla-content-hub/)，這是其雲端平台上的新服務，旨在利用 Gatsby 來源插件建立內容中心與解耦的統一 GraphQL API。[Valhalla 也可與 Next.js 搭配使用](<https://github.com/gatsby-inc/valhalla-examples/blob/main/frameworks/nextjs/app/(pets)/page.tsx>)。

segments.source_content: Static site generators are not very popular at the moment, despite still being suitable for many sites, I think it's good that at least one big player continues to innovate in the field. The Slice API looks like a good idea. I wish Valhalla could run locally, but I think it's a cloud service only.

translations.zh-hant: 靜態網站生成器目前雖不熱門，但仍適用於許多網站。我認為至少有一個主要參與者持續在該領域創新是件好事。Slice API 看起來是個不錯的構想。我期望 Valhalla 能本地運行，但目前看來它僅是雲端服務。

segments.source_content: 🔗 **Useful links**:

- 📜 [Gatsby 5.0 - Release Notes](https://www.gatsbyjs.com/docs/reference/release-notes/v5.0/)
- 📜 [Valhalla Content Hub Explained](https://www.gatsbyjs.com/blog/valhalla-content-hub-explained/)
- 📜 [Gatsby 5 Upgrade. Say No to YOLO](https://www.gatsbyjs.com/blog/gatsby-5-upgrade-say-no-to-yolo/)
- 📜 [Partial Hydration (Beta) Explained](https://www.gatsbyjs.com/blog/partial-hydration-beta-explained/)
- 📜 [The Gatsby Slice API: High Precision Incremental Builds](https://www.gatsbyjs.com/blog/gatsby-slice-api/)
- 🎥 [Valhalla Content Hub video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JvHvwZZAOl0)

translations.zh-hant:
- 📜 [Gatsby 5.0 - 發行說明](https://www.gatsbyjs.com/docs/reference/release-notes/v5.0/)
- 📜 [Valhalla 內容中心詳解](https://www.gatsbyjs.com/blog/valhalla-content-hub-explained/)
- 📜 [升級 Gatsby 5：向 YOLO 說不](https://www.gatsbyjs.com/blog/gatsby-5-upgrade-say-no-to-yolo/)
- 📜 [部分水合作用（測試版）解析](https://www.gatsbyjs.com/blog/partial-hydration-beta-explained/)
- 📜 [Gatsby Slice API：高精度增量建置](https://www.gatsbyjs.com/blog/gatsby-slice-api/)
- 🎥 [Valhalla 內容中心影片](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JvHvwZZAOl0)

segments.source_content: [![React Router-ing Remix](/emails/issues/123/reactroutering.png)](https://remix.run/blog/react-routering-remix)
**[React Router-ing Remix](https://remix.run/blog/react-routering-remix)**

Many Remix data APIs have been added in React-Router 6.4, and much more. Now it's Remix's turn to officially rely on these new React-Router APIs. The upgrade will be done in 4 incremental and backwards compatible steps delivered in Remix v1.x with feature flags. The vision is to make Remix v2 a compiler for React-Router 6.4.

translations.zh-hant: 許多 Remix 資料 API 已加入 React-Router 6.4 中。現在輪到 Remix 正式採用這些新的 React-Router API。升級將分為 4 個增量且向後兼容的步驟，透過 Remix v1.x 的功能標誌逐步交付。最終目標是讓 Remix v2 成為 React-Router 6.4 的編譯器。

segments.source_content: 🔗 **Useful links**:

- 🗺 [Remix on Router v6.4](https://github.com/remix-run/remix/issues/4485)
- 💬 [Remix RFC - v2 meta API](https://github.com/remix-run/remix/discussions/4462)
- 💬 [Remix RFC - Flat Routes](https://github.com/remix-run/remix/discussions/4482)
- 🎙️ [Remix + Shopify - Twitter Space](https://twitter.com/i/spaces/1MnxnpombqBGO)

translations.zh-hant:
- 🗺 [Remix on Router v6.4](https://github.com/remix-run/remix/issues/4485)
- 💬 [Remix RFC - v2 meta API](https://github.com/remix-run/remix/discussions/4462)
- 💬 [Remix RFC - 扁平化路由](https://github.com/remix-run/remix/discussions/4482)
- 🎙️ [Remix + Shopify - Twitter 語音空間](https://twitter.com/i/spaces/1MnxnpombqBGO)

segments.source_content:
- 👀 [React Core PR - Support Promise as a renderable node](https://github.com/facebook/react/pull/25634)
- 📊 [Jamstack Community Survey 2022](https://jamstack.org/survey/2022/): React is widely used at 71%, Next.js accounts for 1 in 2 projects, Remix is growing nicely, and [Docusaurus is doing well](https://twitter.com/sebastienlorber/status/1590042329255391232) too 😜
- 📜 [React Router 6 Deferred Fetch](https://dev.to/infoxicator/react-router-6-deferred-fetch-4k68): pretty cool article that shows how to use the `defer` API, and highlights some subtleties to understand for error handling and avoiding waterfalls.
- 📜 [Reduce cumulative layout shift in Docusaurus with fontaine](https://blog.logrocket.com/docusaurus-using-fontaine-reduce-cumulative-layout-shift/): the same technique used by [@next/font](https://nextjs.org/blog/next-13#nextfont) can be used in other contexts (not limited to Docusaurus) to improve the CLS score
- 📜 [Playing with Astro: Sharing State Between React and Vue Components](https://blog.bitsrc.io/playing-with-astro-sharing-state-between-react-and-vue-components-2d5abc89f4b4): shows how React and Vue can cohabit on an Astro app, and share a state via nanostores.
- 📜 [Remix Simplifies Things](https://bradgarropy.com/blog/remix-simplifies-things): Brad explains why he likes Remix. He can write less JavaScript/React, and more HTML. Using Tailwind seems easier than the links API with regular stylesheets.
- 📜 [Why I Ditched Django for NextJS](https://billprin.com/2022/10/30/ditched-django-nextjs.html): Bill was a "Python guy" working on Google Compute Engine. Finally, he recommends using Next.js (or at least JS/TS) and avoiding Python/Ruby for web projects.
- 📜 [How to Integrate Storybook with Hydrogen](https://wemakewebsites.com/blog/devguide-how-to-integrate-storybook-with-hydrogen/): the integration is not so simple and requires to configure Vite correctly.
- 📜 [What's New in Next.js 13](https://blog.appsignal.com/2022/11/02/whats-new-in-nextjs-13.html): a good overview of Next.js v13 new features
- 📜 [What does CSR, SSR, SSG and ISR means and why should you care?](https://www.flavienbonvin.com/data-building-strategy-for-nextjs-app/): now a good overview of Next.js rendering features before Next.js v13
- 📜 [Implementing 3D Graphics In React](https://blog.openreplay.com/implementing-3d-graphics-in-react/): intro to React-Three-Fiber
- 📜 [The magical world of Particles with React Three Fiber and Shaders](https://blog.maximeheckel.com/posts/the-magical-world-of-particles-with-react-three-fiber-and-shaders/): advanced article on creating particle scenes with React-Three-Fiber and Frame Buffer Objects
- 🎨 [Taxonomy - An open source application using everything new in Next.js 13](https://github.com/shadcn/taxonomy)
- 🐦 [TanStack Query for Angular](https://twitter.com/NetanelBasal/status/1587704203178295297): React-Query is progressively ported to other frameworks
- 🐦 [scheduler.yield() - Upcoming Web API, useful for React?](https://twitter.com/sebastienlorber/status/1589939130225475584)
- 🐦 [Next-Auth - `getServerSession()` in Server Components](https://twitter.com/shadcn/status/1589671069732196352)
- 🧵 [Meet the new `create-next-app`](https://twitter.com/leeerob/status/1589810583444287490): uses TypeScript by default
- 🧵 [You might not need Context in Server Components in Next.js 13](https://twitter.com/sebmarkbage/status/1587615484870098945): Sebastian gives different alternatives to the React context for use in Server Components
- 🎥 [NextJS 13 Warning: Easy Mistake = Infinite Loops](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zwQs4wXr9Bg)
- 📦 [React-Three-Next - updated to Next.js v13](https://twitter.com/onirenaud/status/1587830274175295488)
- 📦 [Redux ToolKit 1.9](https://github.com/reduxjs/redux-toolkit/releases/tag/v1.9.0)
- 📦 [derive-zustand](https://github.com/dai-shi/derive-zustand/)
- 📦 [Generouted 1.6 - file-based routes for Vite](https://twitter.com/oedotme/status/1589720850051522561)
- 📦 [udomsay - A stricter, signals driven, JSX based library](https://github.com/WebReflection/udomsay)
<SubscribeFormEmbed />
## 💸 Sponsor {#sponsor2}

[![Jamf - Easily Secure and Manage Your Apple Devices](https://ucarecdn.com/f5a0c637-c59e-4b81-92d1-31bc896020c0/-/crop/250x146/0,52/-/resize/240x140/)](https://vpdae.com/redirect/p6sxgodi71psw70ruh4ypz7tfc9)

translations.zh-hant: [![Jamf - 輕鬆保護和管理您的 Apple 裝置](https://ucarecdn.com/f5a0c637-c59e-4b81-92d1-31bc896020c0/-/crop/250x146/0,52/-/resize/240x140/)](https://vpdae.com/redirect/p6sxgodi71psw70ruh4ypz7tfc9)

segments.source_content: **[Jamf - Easily Secure and Manage Your Apple Devices](https://vpdae.com/redirect/p6sxgodi71psw70ruh4ypz7tfc9)**

translations.zh-hant: **[Jamf - 輕鬆保護和管理您的 Apple 裝置](https://vpdae.com/redirect/p6sxgodi71psw70ruh4ypz7tfc9)**

segments.source_content: Jamf Now is a mobile device management (MDM) solution for Apple devices. This solution makes device management tasks easy such as configuring Wi-Fi and email settings, deploying apps, securing sensitive company data, and enforcing passcodes. The Jamf Fundamentals plan contains additional security features including Malware Prevention to prevent malicious threats from running on your devices. Sign up and manage up to 3 devices for free and add more for just $2 per device, per month. For more power, upgrade to Jamf Fundamentals to manage 3 devices for free and add more for $4 a month per device.

zh-hant.translation: Jamf Now 是一款適用於 Apple 裝置的行動裝置管理 (MDM) 解決方案。此解決方案讓裝置管理任務變得輕鬆，例如設定 Wi-Fi 和電子郵件設定、部署應用程式、保護敏感的公司資料以及強制執行密碼。Jamf Fundamentals 方案包含額外的安全功能，包括惡意軟體防護，以防止惡意威脅在您的裝置上執行。立即註冊，免費管理最多 3 台裝置，並以每台裝置每月僅 2 美元的價格新增更多裝置。如需更多功能，請升級至 Jamf Fundamentals，免費管理 3 台裝置，並以每台裝置每月 4 美元的價格新增更多裝置。
zh-hant.reason: The number of special elements (links, code, variables) differs. Source has 1, translation has 0.

segments.source_content: ## 📱 React-Native {#react-native}
[![Expo SDK 47](/emails/issues/123/expo47.png)](https://blog.expo.dev/expo-sdk-47-a0f6f5c038af)
**[Expo SDK 47](https://blog.expo.dev/expo-sdk-47-a0f6f5c038af)**
The new SDK 47 has just been officially released, with a more detailed article on what's new.

translations.zh-hant: 新版 SDK 47 已正式發布，並附帶一篇更詳細的新功能介紹文章。

segments.source_content:
- React Native 0.70.5 and React 18.1.0
- Expo Modules API 1.0 allows to create very easily native Fabric modules in Swift/Kotlin
- Hermes available on Expo Go iOS, simplified debugging experience. Hermes will be the default engine in the next SDK
- Fabric support in several Expo modules
- Expo Router in beta: file-system routing for React-Navigation
- Various EAS improvements: end-to-end security, M1 workers...

translations.zh-hant:
- React Native 0.70.5 和 React 18.1.0
- Expo Modules API 1.0 讓您能夠非常輕鬆地在 Swift/Kotlin 中建立原生的 Fabric 模組
- Hermes 已在 Expo Go iOS 上可用，簡化了除錯體驗。Hermes 將在下一版 SDK 中成為預設引擎
- 多個 Expo 模組支援 Fabric
- Expo Router 測試版：用於 React-Navigation 的檔案系統路由
- 各種 EAS 改進：端對端安全性、M1 工作程序...

segments.source_content: In short, a very nice release! With Expo Modules, it seems easier to adopt the new architecture compared to official tools like react-native-codegen which doesn't support Swift yet.

translations.zh-hant: 總而言之，這是一個非常棒的版本！透過 Expo Modules，採用新架構似乎比官方工具（如 react-native-codegen，目前還不支援 Swift）更容易。

segments.source_content:
- 📦 [React-Native 0.71 RC.0](https://twitter.com/CipolleschiR/status/1588578757857533952): includes TypeScript types, uses TypeScript by default for new apps, Flex gap support... A release that also [broke Android builds](https://twitter.com/reactnative/status/1589296764678705155) (now [fixed](https://twitter.com/reactnative/status/1589394317126565888))
- 👥 [Open Native: Native Modules, for all](https://github.com/OpenNative/open-native): an interesting initiative that proposes to de-duplicate the effort of creating native modules between different ecosystems (React-Native, Flutter, Capacitor, NativeScript...) via agnostic native modules and adapters.
- 📜 [Migrating a React Native Library to the New Architecture](https://www.callstack.com/blog/migrating-a-react-native-library-to-the-new-architecture): Oscar migrated React-Native Slider to Fabric, lists the challenges he encountered, and explains the 4 main steps to migrate an existing library, or create a new one.
- 📜 [Introducing End-to-end Security to EAS Update with Code Signing](https://blog.expo.dev/introducing-end-to-end-security-to-eas-update-with-code-signing-b6a14d0d88d4)
- 📜 [Flutter vs. React Native: Which is the right cross-platform framework for you?](https://stackoverflow.blog/2022/10/31/comparing-frameworks-for-cross-platform-apps-flutter-vs-react-native/)
- 💬 [RFC: Metro package exports support](https://github.com/react-native-community/discussions-and-proposals/pull/534) + [Node.js - define "react-native" community condition](https://github.com/nodejs/node/pull/45367)
- 💬 [RFC: Vision for Layout Conformance/Parity](https://github.com/react-native-community/discussions-and-proposals/pull/540/)
- 🎉 [React-Native - Use TypeScript by default for new applications](https://github.com/facebook/react-native/pull/35165)
- 🎙️ [RNR 251 - Examining React Native 0.70](https://reactnativeradio.com/episodes/rnr-251-examining-react-native-070)
- 🎥 [React-Native and Bluetooth Low Energy ( BLE ) - Send and Receive Data](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jeH2QmZ8T14)
- 🎥 [Animated FlatList in React Native](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3ox0R5jPb04)
- 📦 [Storybook-Solito](https://github.com/dannyhw/storybook-solito)

translations.zh-hant:
- 📦 [React-Native 0.71 RC.0](https://twitter.com/CipolleschiR/status/1588578757857533952)：包含 TypeScript 類型，新應用預設使用 TypeScript，支援 Flex gap... 這個版本也[破壞了 Android 建置](https://twitter.com/reactnative/status/1589296764678705155)（現已[修復](https://twitter.com/reactnative/status/1589394317126565888)）
- 👥 [Open Native：通用原生模組](https://github.com/OpenNative/open-native)：這項倡議旨在透過通用原生模組和適配器，減少不同生態系統（React-Native、Flutter、Capacitor、NativeScript...）間重複開發原生模組的工作量
- 📜 [將 React Native 函式庫遷移至新架構](https://www.callstack.com/blog/migrating-a-react-native-library-to-the-new-architecture)：Oscar 將 React-Native Slider 遷移至 Fabric，列出遇到的挑戰，並說明遷移現有函式庫或建立新函式庫的 4 個主要步驟
- 📜 [在 EAS Update 中導入端到端安全與程式碼簽署](https://blog.expo.dev/introducing-end-to-end-security-to-eas-update-with-code-signing-b6a14d0d88d4)
- 📜 [Flutter vs. React Native：哪個才是適合你的跨平台框架？](https://stackoverflow.blog/2022/10/31/comparing-frameworks-for-cross-platform-apps-flutter-vs-react-native/)
- 💬 [RFC：Metro 套件匯出支援](https://github.com/react-native-community/discussions-and-proposals/pull/534) + [Node.js - 定義 "react-native" 社群條件](https://github.com/nodejs/node/pull/45367)
- 💬 [RFC：佈局一致性/對等願景](https://github.com/react-native-community/discussions-and-proposals/pull/540/)
- 🎉 [React-Native - 新應用預設使用 TypeScript](https://github.com/facebook/react-native/pull/35165)
- 🎙️ [RNR 251 - 檢視 React Native 0.70](https://reactnativeradio.com/episodes/rnr-251-examining-react-native-070)
- 🎥 [React-Native 與藍牙低功耗 (BLE) - 傳送與接收資料](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jeH2QmZ8T14)
- 🎥 [React Native 中的動態 FlatList](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3ox0R5jPb04)
- 📦 [Storybook-Solito](https://github.com/dannyhw/storybook-solito)

segments.source_content: ## 🧑‍💻 Jobs {#jobs}
🧑‍💼 [**Product Engineer at Causal, Remote/London/NY, $150-250k**](https://jobs.lever.co/causal-app/4acaafbe-ef3d-45a6-bbe6-687c022d727c?lever-origin=applied&lever-source%5B%5D=thisweekinreact.com)

Causal is a Series A Startup (backed by Coatue/Accel) building an all-in-one tool for working with numbers and visualizing data. We're looking for strong React engineers who can solve difficult UX/performance challenges.

translations.zh-hant: Causal 是 A 輪新創公司（由 Coatue/Accel 支持），開發整合式數字處理與資料視覺化工具。我們正在尋找能解決複雜 UX/效能挑戰的資深 React 工程師

segments.source_content: 🧑‍💼 [**G2i - 100% Remote React Native Jobs**](https://twitter.com/gabe_g2i/status/1563204813881425926?s=20&t=ArRLC77BpRwXXCdx8fnUqw)

We have several roles open for developers focused on React Native! Pay is ~160k plus 10% bonus. You must have production experience with RN and be based in the US. DM [@gabe_g2i](https://twitter.com/gabe_g2i) to learn more and don't forget to mention This Week in React.

translations.zh-hant: 我們開放多個 React Native 開發職位！薪資約 $160k 外加 10% 獎金。需具備 RN 實際生產經驗且位於美國。私訊 [@gabe_g2i](https://twitter.com/gabe_g2i) 了解更多，請註明來自 This Week in React

segments.source_content: 💡 [How to publish an offer?](https://thisweekinreact.com/sponsor)
## 🔀 Other {#other}

- [Announcing Rome v10](https://rome.tools/blog/2022/11/08/rome-10.html): first stable release of the Rome toolchain, which proposes to replace ESLint/Prettier by a faster and easier to use Rust alternative. What attracts me the most is not the speed but especially the part about Error Recovery and error messages.
- [Introducing the CodeSandbox GitHub App](https://codesandbox.io/post/introducing-the-codesandbox-github-app): offers an integration to facilitate contributions and review of pull-requests. This is reminiscent of the recently launched [StackBlitz Codeflow](https://stackblitz.com/codeflow), but with a rather different technology.
- [Jest over Vitest](https://bradgarropy.com/blog/jest-over-vitest): Brad decided to stay on Jest for now, after an attempt to migrate to Vitest that didn't really improve the execution speed and presented some challenges.
- [Vitest 0.25](https://github.com/vitest-dev/vitest/releases/tag/v0.25.0):allows you to write tests for its TypeScript types
- [TypeScript PR - Convert TypeScript to modules](https://twitter.com/sebastienlorber/status/1589958856561434624): in TypeScript 5.0, tsc will be 10-25% faster
- [Xata - Serverless Data Platform for modern web builders](https://twitter.com/xata/status/1587794475274969088)
- [Tina CMS 1.0](https://tina.io/blog/tina-1-0-announcement/)
- [Safari Technology Preview 157](https://webkit.org/blog/13575/release-notes-for-safari-technology-preview-157/)
- [ESLint - consistent-type-imports](https://github.com/typescript-eslint/typescript-eslint/pull/5050)
- [Client-side Routing without the JavaScript](https://dev.to/this-is-learning/client-side-routing-without-the-javascript-3k1i)
- [Performance: Rust and its relationship with Node.js](https://sprkl.dev/performance-rust-node-js/)
- [What is a realm in JavaScript?](https://weizman.github.io/page-what-is-a-realm-in-js/)
- [Tailwind CSS turns 5 years old](https://twitter.com/adamwathan/status/1587128677724291074)
- [New to the web platform in October](https://web.dev/web-platform-10-2022/)
- [Protobuf-ES: The Protocol Buffers TypeScript/JavaScript runtime we all deserve](https://buf.build/blog/protobuf-es-the-protocol-buffers-typescript-javascript-runtime-we-all-deserve)
- [ESLint v8.27](https://eslint.org/blog/2022/11/eslint-v8.27.0-released/)
- [Node.js - drop fetch experimental warning](https://twitter.com/matteocollina/status/1588966117393203203)
- [Node.js - Nov 3 2022 Security Releases](https://nodejs.org/en/blog/vulnerability/november-2022-security-releases/)
- [Playwright now has new getBy APIs](https://dev.to/playwright/playwright-now-has-new-getby-apis-1iad)

translations.zh-hant:
- [Rome v10 正式發布](https://rome.tools/blog/2022/11/08/rome-10.html)：Rome 工具鏈的首個穩定版本，旨在用更快速易用的 Rust 方案取代 ESLint/Prettier。最吸引人的並非速度優勢，而是其錯誤恢復機制和錯誤訊息處理。
- [CodeSandbox GitHub App 登場](https://codesandbox.io/post/introducing-the-codesandbox-github-app)：透過整合簡化貢獻流程與 PR 審核，類似近期推出的 [StackBlitz Codeflow](https://stackblitz.com/codeflow)，但採用截然不同的技術方案。
- [選擇 Jest 而非 Vitest](https://bradgarropy.com/blog/jest-over-vitest)：Brad 在嘗試遷移至 Vitest 後決定暫留 Jest，因執行速度未明顯提升且面臨諸多挑戰。
- [Vitest 0.25](https://github.com/vitest-dev/vitest/releases/tag/v0.25.0)：支援為 TypeScript 類型撰寫測試
- [TypeScript PR - 轉換為模組結構](https://twitter.com/sebastienlorber/status/1589958856561434624)：TypeScript 5.0 將使 tsc 提速 10-25%
- [Xata - 現代網頁開發者的無伺服器資料平台](https://twitter.com/xata/status/1587794475274969088)
- [Tina CMS 1.0](https://tina.io/blog/tina-1-0-announcement/)
- [Safari Technology Preview 157](https://webkit.org/blog/13575/release-notes-for-safari-technology-preview-157/)
- [ESLint - consistent-type-imports 規則](https://github.com/typescript-eslint/typescript-eslint/pull/5050)
- [無需 JavaScript 的客戶端路由方案](https://dev.to/this-is-learning/client-side-routing-without-the-javascript-3k1i)
- [效能探討：Rust 與 Node.js 的協作關係](https://sprkl.dev/performance-rust-node-js/)
- [JavaScript 中的 realm 是什麼？](https://weizman.github.io/page-what-is-a-realm-in-js/)
- [Tailwind CSS 五週年](https://twitter.com/adamwathan/status/1587128677724291074)
- [十月 Web 平台新功能盤點](https://web.dev/web-platform-10-2022/)
- [Protobuf-ES：眾人期盼的 Protocol Buffers TypeScript/JavaScript 運行時](https://buf.build/blog/protobuf-es-the-protocol-buffers-typescript-javascript-runtime-we-all-deserve)
- [ESLint v8.27](https://eslint.org/blog/2022/11/eslint-v8.27.0-released/)
- [Node.js - 移除 fetch 實驗性警告](https://twitter.com/matteocollina/status/1588966117393203203)
- [Node.js - 2022年11月3日安全更新](https://nodejs.org/en/blog/vulnerability/november-2022-security-releases/)
- [Playwright 新增 getBy API 系列](https://dev.to/playwright/playwright-now-has-new-getby-apis-1iad)
